name: unkosher
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of food, places where food is sold, or methods of preparing food) not allowed by Jewish law or not following the rules of Jewish law: The restaurant serves both kosher and unkosher meat. Every restaurant that we contacted was unkosher. It is unkosher for meat and dairy products to be eaten as part of the same meal. Related word
kosherSynonym
non-kosher
More examplesFewer examplesWhen handling the bird, the slaughterer could tell that its wing was broken, a defect that renders it automatically unkosher. The shop claims that it does not sell any unkosher food.Pork and shellfish are unkosher, regardless of how they are prepared.
